animeDescription: TV anime adaptation of Masatoshi Uchizaki's gag comedy manga "Ranpou".  Mild-mannered Japanese kid Rampou is kidnapped by aliens whose UFO-based experiments turn him into a warp boy who truly believes that he can do anything.  (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)
animeVoices: ['Sakamoto, Chika', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Futamata, Issei', 'Tsushima, Mizuho', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Satou, Masaharu', 'Aoki, Kazuyo', 'Kameyama, Sukekiyo', 'Sawaki, Ikuya', 'Aoki, Kazuyo']
